description: Methods, such as "rescue" and "suspend" expect to receive a body argument. However, the argument is extraneous. All of the OS API methods not using the argument should be cleaned up.
title: Numerous OSAPI commands expect a body argument, but never use it

comments.content: Methods, such as "rescue" and "suspend" expect to receive a body argument. However, the argument is extraneous. All of the OS API methods not using the argument should be cleaned up.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~cerberus
